meanings.definition: A person who receives a pension.
meanings.sent1: The pensionaries were happy to receive their monthly payments.
meanings.sent2: The government office processed the paperwork for the pensionaries efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The pensionaries joked about spending their pension money on a tropical vacation.
meanings.sent4: The pensionaries were like treasure chests, holding years of hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The pensionaries gathered to share stories of their working days over tea.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a pensionary.
meanings.sent1: The pensionaries meeting discussed the latest changes in pension policies.
meanings.sent2: She wore a pensionaries pin to show her support for retired workers.
meanings.sent3: The pensionaries party had decorations in shades of blue and gray, symbolizing retirement.
meanings.sent4: His pensionaries attitude towards saving money inspired his younger colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The old clock on the wall had a pensionaries charm, reminding everyone of the passage of time.
